analysis.key_quote: I strongly object to this proposal for the reasons described and urge all parties involved to reject this proposal to prevent the reckless and dangerous consequences of removing qualified workers to pack positions with loyalists who operate based political pressures rather than rule of law.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about the erosion of the merit-based system and the potential for politicization of the civil service, which undermines its integrity and effectiveness.
